General.Name: Manulife Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Manulife Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, underwrites participating and non-participating life insurance and unit-linked products in Malaysia. The company operates through Investment Holding, Life Insurance, and Asset Management Services segments. It offers various insurance products and services, such as life, health, and savings and investment linked plan, signature; life insurance broking; and bancassurance products, private retirement schemes, and unit trusts funds. The company also provides asset and wealth, investment, and fund management services, as well as property rental and management services; and invests in money market funds, and corporate and sovereign bonds. It serves individuals and institutions. The company was formerly known as Manulife Insurance (Malaysia) Berhad and changed its name to Manulife Holdings Berhad in October 2008. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Manulife Holdings Berhad is a subsidiary of Manulife Century Holdings (Netherlands) B.V.
